title: Children’s Day Special!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Eli-san…. Look<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh, what-.... Pfft, fufu, ahahaha!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s board 「Children’s Day Special」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufufu, I-, I’m sorry, for laughing so suddenly like that….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>No…. It’s just as planned. This is a Rina-chan’s board…. That I’ve prepared for this occasion, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Still, it’s amazing. How did you make it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That’s…. A trade secret. I got help…. From Rin-chan and the others<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>They can do stuff like this too huh…. Fufufu, s-, sorry, it won’t stop….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ehehe…. I’m so happy. I got to see…. Eli-san’s laughing fit. If I can make people laugh a lot…. Then I can get close to them, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>My. We’ve been close since long ago, no? But today, I guess we can get even closer<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
